notes: The provided evidence does not establish a direct relationship between the fields 'subbandSize' and 'typeI-SinglePanel-ri-Restriction'. The evidence discusses conditions related to CSI Reporting Settings and codebookType, but does not explicitly link the two target fields within the same IE.

meta.evidence: - reportQuantity is set to 'cri-RSRP' or 'ssb-Index-RSRP' or 'cri-SINR', or 'ssb-Index-SINR' or 'cri-RSRPCapability[Set]Index' or 'ssb-Index-RSRP-Capability[Set]Index' or 'cri-SINR-Capability[Set]Index', or 'ssb-Index-SINR-Capability[Set]Index' otherwise, the CSI Reporting Setting is said to have a subband frequency-granularity. A CSI Reporting Setting with codebookType set to 'typeI-SinglePanel' and the corresponding CSI-RS Resource Set for channel measurement configured with two Resource Groups and N Resource Pairs, as described in clause 5.2.1.4.1, can be configured with wideband frequency-granularity only if csi-ReportMode is set to 'Model' and numberOfSingleTRP-CSI-Model is set to X=0 , as described in clause 5.2.1.4.2. If the UE is configured with a CSI Reporting Setting for a bandwidth part with fewer than 24 PRBs, the CSI reporting setting is expected to have a wideband frequency-granularity, and, if applicable, the higher layer parameter codebookType is set to 'typel-SinglePanel'. The first subband size is given by N_{P R B}^{S B}-\left(N_{B I T P_{j}}^{S^{\text {stor }}} \bmod N_{P R B}^{S B}\right) and the last subband size given by \left(N_{B I T P_{j},}^{\text {start }}+N_{B I R P_{j},}^{\text {size }}\right) \bmod N_{P R B}^{S B} if If a UE is configured with semi-persistent CSI reporting, the UE shall report CSI when both CSI-IM and NZP CSI-RS resources are configured as periodic or semi-persistent. If a UE is configured with aperiodic CSI reporting, the UE shall report CSI when both CSI-IM and NZP CSI-RS resources are configured as periodic, semi-persistent or aperiodic.
